name: typography-options-type
description: OptionsType which is useful for typography theme using typography.js
author: isamrish <askmaurya48@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn run clean && flow-copy-source src dist/flow/ && yarn run rename
scripts.rename: mkdirp dist/js/ && cp dist/flow/index.js.flow dist/js/index.js && cp dist/flow/GoogleFontsType.js.flow dist/js/GoogleFontsType.js && cp dist/flow/VerticalRhythmType.js.flow dist/js/VerticalRhythmType.js
